name: Islamia College of Science & Commerce, Srinagar

content.College Info: Islamia College of Science & Commerce, Srinagar, located in Srinagar, is a prestigious B+ NAAC accredited autonomous/college institution offering world-class arts & science programs. The college is known for its excellent academic standards, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and strong industry connections. Students gain admission through University Entrance and benefit from experienced faculty, modern laboratories, and comprehensive learning resources. The institution maintains high placement rates and provides students with opportunities for research, internships, and skill development programs.
content.Courses:
Courses Offered

  • Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
  • Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com Hons.)
  • Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)
  • Bachelor of Science (B.Sc Hons.) Biotech, Nano Science, Zoology, Botany, Chemistry, IT, Mathematics
  • Master of Business Administration (MBA)
  • Master of Science (M.Sc) Zoology, Chemistry, Botany
  • Master of Arts (M.A) English
  • Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
content.Fees:
